McKague-McGregor Family Reunion in Castleton, August 14, 1999

If you weren't there, you missed a good party! This is the first of these gatherings in about 40 years and we had a chance to meet a lot of new relatives from different lines. No blood was shed and no reputations were ruined and we STILL had a good time. If you attended and have pictures that we don't have here, please let me know. (We haven't posted ones here that were near duplicates of these, but you may have some new ones for us.)If you are even remotely connected to our McGregors or McKagues, please plan to attend the next party. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
